channel.title: Panelist on Anand Chowdhary
channel.description: Recent content in Panelist on Anand Chowdhary

item.title: AKEPT-WIEF Social Enterprise Forum
item.description: I’ll be speaking about social entrepreneurship at the AKEPT-WIEF Social Enterprise Forum in Kuala Lumpur later this year. The event is a collaboration between the higher education and leadership academy AKEPT and the World Islamic Economic Forum Foundation.

item.title: Tech Charcha by Facebook DevC
item.description: I was part of a panel discussion on the future of technology by Facebook’s Developer Circles Delhi-NCR along with Chinmaya Saxena, Developer Programs Lead, Facebook India; Saransh Kataria, Chapter Lead, Facebook Developer Circle Delhi; and Shubhamoy Chakrabarty, COO at Cloudtub, Inc.
